https://leetcode.cn/problems/add-two-numbers


```
/**
 * Definition for singly-linked list.
 * struct ListNode {
 *     int val;
 *     ListNode *next;
 *     ListNode() : val(0), next(nullptr) {}
 *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(nullptr) {}
 *     ListNode(int x, ListNode *next) : val(x), next(next) {}
 * };
 */
class Solution {
public:
    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {
        bool over = false;
        int overValue = 0;
        int left;
        ListNode* head = l1;
        ListNode* l1Pre = nullptr;
        ListNode* tailNode = nullptr;
        while(true){
            if (l1 == nullptr){
                l1Pre->next = l2;
                if (l1Pre->next == nullptr and over){
                    ListNode* newNode = new ListNode(1);
                    l1Pre->next = newNode;
                    tailNode = l1Pre->next;
                } else if (over){
                    l1Pre->next->val += overValue;
                    tailNode = l1Pre->next;
                }
                over =false;
                break;
            } else if (l2 == nullptr){
                if (over) {
                    l1->val += 1;
                    tailNode = l1;
                }
                over = false;
                break;
            }
            if (over) {
                l1->val += overValue;
            }
            over = false;
            l1->val += l2->val;
            left = l1->val % 10;
            if (left != l1->val){
                over = true;
                overValue = 1;
                l1->val = left;
            }
            l1Pre = l1;
            l1 = l1->next;
            l2 = l2->next;
        }
        while (true) {
            if (tailNode == nullptr) {
                if (over) {
                    ListNode* newNode = new ListNode(1);
                    l1Pre->next = newNode;
                    tailNode = l1Pre->next;
                }
                break;
            }
            if (over){
                tailNode->val += overValue;
            }
            over = false;
            left = tailNode->val % 10;
            if (left != tailNode->val){
                over = true;
                overValue = 1;
                tailNode->val = left;
            }
            l1Pre = tailNode;
            tailNode = tailNode->next;
        }

        return head;
    }
};
```

执行用时：36 ms, 在所有 C++ 提交中击败了20.58%的用户

内存消耗：68.8 MB, 在所有 C++ 提交中击败了99.43%的用户

通过测试用例：1568 / 1568
